Hey! You know I've got some solid experience installing laminate flooring. I'm pretty meticulous about the details, so you can count on the finished product looking sharp. Check out these photos of some recent projects I've wrapped up. If you're tired of that old nasty carpet and want to swap it out for some easy-to-maintain laminate, just give me a shout. We can catch up over a beer and I can walk you through the whole process. No pressure, just thought I'd put it out there since I know how much you hate that carpet!
